author: Jonathan Swan
title: Armchair critics seize new role in debate over reopening the U.S. economy
description: The great debate over when and how to reopen the American economy is playing out on the Sunday morning news shows, in opinion pages of the nation's newspapers — and among an increasingly influential cohort of armchair critics taking issue with faulty projecti…
